editorialNotes.standard: Movingâ€™s a drag! Relocate to this satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

editorialNotes.standard: Neatly arranging fountain pens and acrylic paints not only declutters drawers and cupboards but also soothes our minds.

name: A Dance of Fire and Ice

editorialNotes.standard: Pencil in time for nostalgic cannon duels in this hand-drawn reimagining of an old-school classic, where cannonballs fly while scribbled tumbleweeds bounce across graphite landscapes.

Developer Jan Ilavsky came up with the idea for this gorgeous Apple Design Award winner after heâ€™d broken his arm. He started on an infinite runner that could be played one-handed, and since heâ€™s also colorblind, he added a gameplay element about changing between vibrant neon colors. Chameleon Run succeeds beautifully, balancing wicked speed with irresistible, just-one-more-try challenges.
editorialNotes.short: You'll need quick reactions in this intense polychromatic platformer.

editorialNotes.standard: Tiny Wings has been a longtime favorite of ours, thanks to its gentle vibe, fantastic music, and surprisingly awesome one-touch gameplay. Outrunning the sun across procedurally generated islands is rewarding and relaxing, and we love the added challenge of the four-bird race mode. The gameâ€™s vivid, vibrant colors absolutely dazzle on Apple TVâ€”we feel like weâ€™re meeting our flightless friends for the first time again.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Mash through waves of foes as a heavily armed potato in this spud-tacular arena survival game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Are aliens really out there? Discover the truth by rummaging through crop circles, pizza trucks, and more in this interactive hidden-object game.

editorialNotes.tagline: Our favourite love guru is back!

editorialNotes.standard: With relaxed swapping rules and charming graphics, this surprisingly slick match-3 puzzler makes the genre feel fresh again.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: This clever physics-based puzzle game challenges you to spray water to extinguish fires and manipulate the environment. Its simple, clearly defined mechanics allow for intuitive, satisfying puzzle-solving. New elements are routinely layered in, ensuring that the challenges stay interesting. Great visuals and impressive sound also set Sprinkle Islands apart.

Revenge is a dish served with epic property damage and plenty of attitude when a princess and her pet dragon decide theyâ€™re tired of getting captured. Itâ€™s pure destructive joy guiding this royal duo over (and under) a gorgeous fantasy landscape of fleeing knights, treacherous traps, and mighty bosses to smash. The game pops with personalityâ€”and its simple controls, slick level design, and upgradable equipment keep the challenge fun and fresh.

The makers of the awesomely chaotic Does Not Commute have returned with a very different sort of game, casting you as a lab tech who must recapture subatomic particles as they drift away from an atomic core. Connecting colored dots might sound simple enough, but every neuron in your decidedly non-mechanical brain will be firing as you extend your particle strings and snag valuable score multipliers. Soothing ambient music perfectly complements the intense focus required to master each rewarding level. Who said lab work was boring?

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Explore the nature of AIâ€”and learn a thing or two about yourselfâ€”in this snappy RPG that doubles as a personality test.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Packing tons of great vehicles and multiple ways to play, Mini Motor Racing hits the sweet spot between frantic arcade driving and the depth of realistic racers. The look is cute yet richly detailed, with luscious lighting and environmental effects across a variety of tracks and terrains. Win cash to upgrade your ride in the lengthy career mode, or hit the quickplay and multiplayer circuits for a spin around the block. However you roll, flexible steering options let you drive with precision for a great time behind the wheel.
Juggle impatient passengers by efficiently moving elevators in this minimalist mix of puzzling and strategy.
A talking goat ate your grimoire! Relearn recipes by collecting reagents and tricking folks in this bewitchingly fun fairy tale.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Orange ball with a mustache, corner pocket! Nail wild trick shots in this clever mashup of billiards and golf.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Part platformer, part puzzler, Edge has infatuated gamers almost since the opening of the App Store. Guide a nimble cube around the narrow ledges and ever-shifting corridors of a treacherous 3D world, unlocking secrets and collecting items without falling into space. Stylishly minimalist visuals and a slick electronic soundtrack make Edgeâ€™s mix of path-finding challenges and pitfall-avoiding thrills easy to get lost in. Its dozens of levels of perfectly balanced gameplay redefine how much fun simplicity and sophistication can be.

name: Funny Ghosts! Games for kids
artistName: DOG&FROG Educational preschool kids games for girls and boys, toddlers and babies

editorialNotes.standard: How far can you roll a sphere down a super-steep, never-ending ramp before falling off? Find out in this devilishly tough but instantly accessible score-based racing gameâ€”a masterpiece whose simple controls and wonderfully minimalist presentation will keep you coming back again and again. Whether you stick to the road with precision driving or fling yourself into the unknown with wild jumps, youâ€™ll be engrossed and pushed to your limits.

This spectacular collection by Zen Studios, the Jedi masters of virtual pinball, brings the Star Wars saga to life like youâ€™ve never seen it before. Based on the films, TV shows, and even iconic characters, each dazzlingly detailed game plays like a true labor of love. Beyond the brilliant table designs, the flawless physics faithfully recreate the mechanics of real pinball with stunning sights and sounds straight out of a galaxy far, far away.
